On 06/22/2010 07:40 AM, Ji Zhang wrote:
> Dear Radiance experts,
> 
> May I ask if there's a latest version of Radiance (4.0) built for Ubuntu
> system?
> 
> What I can find and install via the "Ubuntu software center" is "Radiance
> 3R9+20100109-1".


Ubuntu was frozen when 4R0 was released. Either use Debian or make a simple
backport:


apt-get install devscripts fakeroot
apt-get build-dep radiance
dget -xu
http://ftp.de.debian.org/debian/pool/main/r/radiance/radiance_4R0+20100331-1.dsc


cd radiance-4R0+20100331
dpkg-buildpackage
cd ..
dpkg -i radiance*.deb
